SEARCH
Package users.employees

Class Manager

java.lang.Object
users.BaseUser
users.employees.Employee
users.employees.Manager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, User
public class Manager extends Employee
Represents a Manager in the system, responsible for managing courses, users, and administrative tasks. Extends the Employee class and adds specific managerial responsibilities.
See Also:

    • Manager

      public Manager(String firstName, String lastName, int age, Gender gender, ManagerType managerType)
      Parameterized constructor to initialize a Manager with personal and managerial information.
      Parameters:
      firstName - First name of the manager
      lastName - Last name of the manager
      age - Age of the manager
      gender - Gender of the manager
      managerType - Type of manager (e.g., Academic, Administrative)

      public void addLessonToCourse(Course course, int lessonRoom, LocalDate lessonDate, DayOfWeek dayOfWeek, TimeWindow lessonTime, LessonType lessonType, Teacher teacher)
      Adds a lesson to a course schedule.
      Parameters:
      course - The course to add the lesson to
      lessonRoom - Room number for the lesson
      lessonDate - Date of the lesson
      dayOfWeek - Day of the week for the lesson
      lessonTime - Time window for the lesson
      lessonType - Type of lesson (e.g., Lecture, Lab)
      teacher - Teacher conducting the lesson
